title: Strengthening Software Development Competencies: ICT-Based Tsunami Disaster Risk Reduction Experiential Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain tsunami generation mechanisms and damage patterns in connection with geographical factors

Using ICT simulation tools (e.g., Unity-based disaster experience programs), learners can select at least two of three scenarios (fire/earthquake) and complete experiential tasks by performing five-stage survival procedures (risk recognition → evacuation route navigation → movement to safe zone → emergency response → post-incident reporting) with over 80% accuracy per scenario.
Learners collaboratively create and present tsunami evacuation plans tailored to local community characteristics

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
